verses.t: Let{G3049} a man{G444} so{G3779} account{G3049} of us{G2248}, as{G5613} of the ministers{G5257} of Christ{G5547}, and{G2532} stewards{G3623} of the mysteries{G3466} of God{G2316}.
Moreover{G3063} it is required{G2212} in{G1722} stewards{G3588}, that{G2443} a man{G5100} be found{G2147} faithful{G4103}.

But{G1161} with me{G1698} it{G1519} is{G2076} a very small thing{G1646} that{G2443} I should be judged{G350} of{G5259} you{G5216}, or{G2228} of{G5259} man's{G442} judgment{G2250}: yea{G235}, I judge{G350} not{G3761} mine own self{G1683}.
For{G1063} I know{G4894} nothing{G3762} by myself{G1683}; yet{G235} am I{G1344} not{G3756} hereby{G5129} justified{G1344}: but{G1161} he{G3588} that judgeth{G350} me{G3165} is{G2076} the Lord{G2962}.

Therefore{G5620} judge{G2919} nothing{G3361} before{G4253} the time{G2540}, until{G2193} the Lord{G3588} come{G2064}, who{G3739} both{G2532} will bring to light{G5461} the hidden things{G2927} of darkness{G3588}, and{G2532} will make manifest{G5319} the counsels{G3588} of the hearts{G3588}: and{G2532} then{G5119} shall{G1096} every man{G1538} have{G1096} praise{G3588} of{G575} God{G3588}.

And{G1161} these things{G5023}, brethren{G80}, I have in a figure transferred{G3345} to{G1519} myself{G1683} and{G2532} to Apollos{G625} for{G1223} your sakes{G5209}; that{G2443} ye might learn{G3129} in{G1722} us{G2254} not{G3361} to think{G5426} of men above{G5228} that which{G3739} is written{G1125}, that{G2443} no{G3361} one{G1520} of you be puffed up{G5448} for{G5228} one{G1520} against{G2596} another{G2087}.

For{G1063} who{G5101} maketh{G1252} thee{G4571} to differ{G1252} from another? and{G1161} what{G5101} hast thou{G2192} that{G3739} thou didst{G2983} not{G3756} receive{G2983}? now{G1161} if{G1487} thou didst receive{G2983} it, why{G5101} dost thou glory{G2744}, as if{G5613} thou hadst{G2983} not{G3361} received{G2983} it?

Now{G2235} ye are{G2075} full{G2880}, now{G2235} ye are rich{G4147}, ye have reigned as kings{G936} without{G5565} us{G2257}: and{G2532} I would to God{G3785} ye did reign{G936}, that{G2443} we{G2249} also{G2532} might reign{G4821} with you{G5213}.

For{G1063} I think{G1380} that{G3754} God{G3588} hath set forth{G584} us{G2248} the apostles{G3588} last{G2078}, as it were{G5613} appointed to death{G1935}: for{G3754} we are made{G1096} a spectacle{G2302} unto the world{G3588}, and{G2532} to angels{G32}, and{G2532} to men{G444}.

We{G2249} are fools{G3474} for{G1223} Christ's sake{G5547}, but{G1161} ye{G5210} are wise{G5429} in{G1722} Christ{G5547}; we{G2249} are weak{G772}, but{G1161} ye{G5210} are strong{G2478}; ye{G5210} are honourable{G1741}, but{G1161} we{G2249} are despised{G820}.

Even unto{G891} this present{G737} hour{G5610} we{G3983} both{G2532} hunger{G3983}, and{G2532} thirst{G1372}, and{G2532} are naked{G1130}, and{G2532} are buffeted{G2852}, and{G2532} have no certain dwellingplace{G790};
And{G2532} labour{G2872}, working{G2038} with our own{G2398} hands{G5495}: being reviled{G3058}, we bless{G2127}; being persecuted{G1377}, we suffer it{G430}:
Being defamed{G987}, we intreat{G3870}: we are made{G1096} as{G5613} the filth{G4027} of the world{G3588}, and are the offscouring{G4067} of all things{G3956} unto{G2193} this day{G737}.
I write{G1125} not{G3756} these things{G5023} to shame{G1788} you{G5209}, but{G235} as{G5613} my{G3450} beloved{G27} sons{G5043} I warn{G3560} you.

For{G1063} though{G1437} ye have{G2192} ten thousand{G3463} instructers{G3807} in{G1722} Christ{G5547}, yet{G235} have ye not{G3756} many{G4183} fathers{G3962}: for{G1063} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424} I{G1473} have begotten{G1080} you{G5209} through{G1223} the gospel{G3588}.
Wherefore{G3767} I beseech{G3870} you{G5209}, be ye{G1096} followers{G3402} of me{G3450}.

For{G1223} this cause{G5124} have I sent{G3992} unto you{G5213} Timotheus{G5095}, who{G3739} is{G2076} my{G3450} beloved{G27} son{G5043}, and{G2532} faithful{G4103} in{G1722} the Lord{G2962}, who{G3739} shall bring{G363} you{G5209} into remembrance{G363} of my{G3450} ways{G3588} which be{G3588} in{G1722} Christ{G5547}, as{G2531} I teach{G1321} every where{G3837} in{G1722} every{G3956} church{G1577}.
Now{G1161} some{G5100} are puffed up{G5448}, as though{G5613} I{G3450} would{G2064} not{G3361} come{G2064} to{G4314} you{G5209}.

But{G1161} I will come{G2064} to{G4314} you{G5209} shortly{G5030}, if{G1437} the Lord{G3588} will{G2309}, and{G2532} will know{G1097}, not{G3756} the speech{G3588} of them which{G3588} are puffed up{G5448}, but{G235} the power{G3588}.
For{G1063} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588} is not{G3756} in{G1722} word{G3056}, but{G235} in{G1722} power{G1411}.
What{G5101} will ye{G2309}? shall I come{G2064} unto{G4314} you{G5209} with{G1722} a rod{G4464}, or{G2228} in{G1722} love{G26}, and{G5037} in the spirit{G4151} of meekness{G4236}?
